title: Stove-top beef pot roast
ingredients: ['1.5kg beef brisket or silverside, with fat', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large onion, roughly diced', '1 medium carrot, roughly diced', '2 garlic cloves, thinly sliced', '1 pinch dried thyme', '2 bay leaves', '125ml red wine (or beef stock)', '1 heaped teaspoon brown sugar', 'salt, to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper, to taste']
